review.title: “A learning experience”
review.pros: Pros – Lovely office complex. Decent work hours that allow you to have a social life beyond work. Association (indirectly) with a well-respected brand.
review.cons: Cons – No respect for employees. Unreasonable and unprofessional demands made on employees. Repressive work environment. Not much scope for growth. Haphazard functioning.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to be more open to criticism, learn to handle employees better and put more efficient processes in place for smoother functioning.
